meanings.sent1: The boy is sneezy when he plays in the flowers.
meanings.sent2: She is always sneezy around cats.
meanings.sent3: The sneezy puppy made everyone laugh at the park.
meanings.sent4: The sneezy kitten seemed to have a never-ending supply of tissues.
meanings.sent5: The sneezy girl's nose was like a tiny trumpet announcing spring.

meanings.sent1: The sneezy cat made the whole house dusty.
meanings.sent2: The sneezy season is upon us with all the pollen in the air.
meanings.sent3: The sneezy cartoon character had tissues flying everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The sneezy old house seemed to be allergic to cleanliness.
meanings.sent5: The sneezy forest was filled with the sound of rustling leaves and sneezes.
